title: How to Use Shiatsu for Flatulence and Bloating

steps.headline: Sit in a straight-backed chair with your feet flat on the floor.
Place the tips of all four fingers of your right hand on your right leg, just below the kneecap.
steps.description: Where your pinkie falls is the pressure point to activate your stomach and aid digestion. You should feel a small indentation. If you are left-hand-dominant, find the pressure point on left leg.

steps.headline: Move your index and second finger to that spot.
steps.description: Press your fingertips into that spot for up to one minute.

steps.headline: Sit in a straight-backed chair with your feet flat and your knees bent 90 degrees.
Cross your right ankle over your left knee.
steps.description: If you are left-hand dominant, cross your left ankle over your right knee.

steps.headline: Press the flat part of your thumb into the space just below the ball of your foot for up to one minute.
steps.description: This pressure point stimulates circulation around your digestive tract, clears up gas and calms your stomach.

methods.name: Top of the Foot Pressure Point

steps.headline: Sit in a straight-baked chair with your feet flat and your knees bent 90 degrees.
Cross your right ankle over your left knee.
steps.description: If you are left-hand dominant, cross your left ankle over your right knee.

steps.headline: Press your index and second fingers into the space between the knuckles at the base of your second and third toes.
steps.description: This pressure point stimulates the stomach to eliminate gas.

steps.headline: Sit or stand or lie in a comfortable position.
steps.description: Remaining comfortable is one key in how to use shiatsu for flatulence and bloating.

steps.headline: Bend your left arm 90 degrees with your palm facing downward.
steps.description: If you are left-hand dominant, bend your right arm.

steps.headline: Place the tips of your index and second fingers on your wrist below the base of your thumb.
steps.description: This meridian stimulates the large intestine.

steps.headline: Press the tips of your index and second fingers into this point for up to one minute.
